messages.title: FREE CHILDCARE AND A FAIRER ECONOMY
messages.content: Families are working harder than ever, but far too many are struggling to get by. Jo Swinson said, 'This will close the gap between the end of paid parental leave and the start for funded nursery provision, and will save families thousands of pounds a year.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.
Provide free childcare for all children of working parents from 9 months old.

mentions.candidate: Boris Johnson facing Lib Dems surge.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Michael Gove wanted to privatise it. Boris wanted to charge people for using it. The NHS is about as safe with them as a pet hamster would be with a hungry python. - former Conservative Prime Minister John Major
mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour are out of the race

issues.economy: Families are working harder than ever, but far too many are struggling to get by.
issues.socialWelfare: Free childcare for all children of working parents from 9 months old.

leaflet.personalStatement: I used to vote Conservative, now I'm voting Lib Dem

endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything.
Boris Johnson really is the British Donald Trump

quotes.text: Boris Johnson facing Lib Dems surge.
The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything.
Boris Johnson really is the British Donald Trump

images.caption: Jo Swinson with a group of children and adults, indicating a focus on families and children.
Comparative image of Boris Johnson and Donald Trump, implying a negative association.
